title: Black Adder - The Ultimate Collection
description: The Ultimate Collection of Black Adder includes all four seasons of six episodes per season, an unaired pilot episode, and two extras folders. The first extra folder contains the Christmas Carol episode, the film from 2000 Black Adder - Back and Forth, a video diary from Baldrick, and an unaired episode entitled The Cavalier Years. The Second extras folder contains 9 interviews with everyone from the cast doing their own interview or group interview (i.e. Miranda Richardson, and Tony Robinson) and a tenth television special with everyone involved in the show.
